levels.description:
The next attack hits 1 additional target and deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage; if only <@ba.vup>1</> enemy is attacked, applies <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> to the target for <@ba.vup>{levitate}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charges</>
